Articles.Content: so when ever i try and use this during hohmann transfer the waypoint starts freaking out and flying all over the place causing the ship to chase after it endlessly. i tried reinstalling the mod but that didnt help. anyone know whats going on?
Please follow the guidelines in the How To Get Support sticky.

Turn off RCS and try again.

But yeah, also do what NathanKell said in future.

Open MechJeb's Maneuver Planner and look in the box on the bottom-right. Make sure the Tolerance value is set to 0.1 m/s. Mine got changed once somehow and it exhibited these same symptoms (if the number is too large).
